title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan in a bowl.
Drain pasta and quickly mix with pancetta and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Chunks of grilled chicken in a creamy spiced tomato sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 2 hours.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked through.
In a pan, sauté onions, garlic, and ginger until soft.
Add tomatoes and cook for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and grilled chicken, simmer for 10 more minutes.
Serve with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: A quick and healthy mix of vegetables sautéed in soy sauce and garlic.
instructions: Chop all vegetables.
Heat sesame oil in a wok.
Add garlic and sauté for 1 minute.
Add vegetables and stir-fry on high heat.
Add soy sauce and cook for 2 more minutes.

title: Beef Stroganoff
description: Creamy beef and mushroom sauce served over noodles.
instructions: Sauté onions and mushrooms.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Stir in mustard and sour cream.
Simmer for 5 minutes and serve over noodles.

title: Avocado Toast
description: Simple and nutritious toast topped with mashed avocado and seasoning.
instructions: Toast the bread slices.
Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread avocado mixture on toast.
Sprinkle chili flakes and serve.

title: Grilled Salmon
description: Salmon fillet grilled to perfection with herbs and lemon.
instructions: Preheat grill.
Season salmon with salt, pepper, and dill.
Grill for 5–6 minutes per side.
Serve with lemon slices.

title: French Toast
description: Golden brown bread soaked in egg and milk, topped with syrup.
instructions: Whisk egg and milk in a bowl.
Dip bread slices and coat well.
Fry in butter until golden brown.
Top with syrup and serve.

title: Chickpea Curry
description: Hearty vegetarian curry made with chickpeas and spices.
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic.
Add spices and stir for 1 min.
Add tomatoes and chickpeas.
Simmer for 15 minutes.

title: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil drizzled with olive oil.
instructions: Slice mozzarella and tomatoes.
Layer with basil leaves.
Drizzle olive oil and season.

title: Shrimp Fried Rice
description: Fried rice with shrimp, vegetables, and soy sauce.
instructions: Scramble egg in a pan and set aside.
Sauté shrimp, then add vegetables.
Add rice and soy sauce, mix well.
Stir in egg and top with green onion.
